timeline.bodyText:
Is there an reason to use addParametersMatcher(MethodMatchers.ANY) over withAnyParameters()?
Edit: Just saw that you use both further down in the file.
timeline.author: johann-beleites-sonarsource

replies.bodyText:
withAnyParameters() will match any number of parameters, of any type.
addParametersMatcher(MethodMatchers.ANY) will match exactly one parameter with any type.
I use the latter here in order to be sure that I will not be out of bound when I access the argument at line 102 (even if it is not possible currently, I prefer to be safe).
For getMethodInvocationMatchers, doesNotContain can take an index as second argument, the rule does not apply then.
Does it make sense?
replies.author: quentin-jaquier-sonarsource
